data.name: Argonauts Agency: Captive of Circe
data.detailed_description:
One quiet morning, a courier appeared at the threshold of the Argonauts Agency. He brought a wedding invitation for Jason and Medea from their old friend, the collector Pelias. Hidden in the letter was a secret request for help. Jason and Medea can’t leave their friend in trouble!

Join the Argonauts in new time management game, learn the story of Circe and free her prisoners! Construct buildings, remove obstacles, repair damaged bridges.
Over 40 beautiful levels await you, along with a multitude of varied quests, increasing difficulty, an upbeat plot, an extraordinary magical world and exciting gameplay for all ages. Construct buildings and manage resources.

- carefully designed zones
- an exciting story told in comics, memorable characters
- dozens of quests
- new mechanics
- rich graphics
- relaxing music
- a helpful guide

data.short_description: The Argonauts Agency – An invitation to a wedding sets in motion an incredible investigation with an unexpected twist!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP SP3 or later
  • Processor: 1500 MHz
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 490 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7 or later
  • Processor: 2000 MHz
  • Memory: 1024 MB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 490 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OS X 10.11.6
  • Processor: CPU: 1.0 GHz
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Storage: 490 MB available space
